statements: UPDATE game_progress SET player_name = 'John Doe', level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET experience = 500, achievements = '{"completed": 3}' WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE game_progress SET player_name = 'John Doe', level = 5, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE game_progress SET achievements = '["First Achievement", "Second Achievement"]', level = 10 WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE game_progress SET experience = experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, achievement_name = 'LevelUp' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_progress SET experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE achievements SET timestamp = '2023-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE player_id = 456 AND achievement_name = 'Level 10';
UPDATE GameProgress SET progress = 0.75 WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_name = 'Snake';
UPDATE PlayerInfo SET total_score = 5000, player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE GameProgress SET progress = 0.75 WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_name = 'Super Mario';
UPDATE PlayerInfo SET player_name = 'John Doe', total_score = total_score + 100 WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'Master Explorer' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE achievements SET achievement_date = '2022-09-15', achievement_name = 'Master of the Game' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND game_id = 'aabbccdd-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE GameProgress SET level = 5 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE PlayerInfo SET registration_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE GameProgress SET level = 15 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE PlayerInfo SET player_name = 'John Doe', registration_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE player_id = 456;
